Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 5/1/1986, off John Butcher (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/21/1986, off John Denny (PHI)...

Injured on 9/8/1986 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...

2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,307,143 through salary arbitration...

Won World Series with Cincinnati in 1990...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,021,429 through salary arbitration...
